StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [SignTrainingEval]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@EvalID uniqueidentifier, @SignatureId uniqueidentifier, @UpdateUserId uniqueidentifier
AS BEGIN
UPDATE [RSSOSS].[USMC].[TrainingEvalua.on] SET SignatureID = @SignatureId, LastUpdatedDate = GETDATE(), LastUpdatedBy = @UpdateUserId, CompletedDate = GETDATE() WHERE ID = @EvalID
END
